title: Diamond Vaddanam with Emerald Centerpiece and Pearl Drops - The 'Lakshmi Kamarband'
materials: South Sea Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster and durability.
features: Intricate filigree diamond work in a floral pattern. The central piece features a striking oval-cut emerald, adding a regal touch. Delicate South Sea pearl drops adorn the lower edge, enhancing its feminine appeal. Designed with flexible links for a comfortable fit. Handcrafted by skilled artisans from Hyderabad, reflecting generations of expertise.
occasions: and other auspicious occasions. A statement piece for the modern bride who appreciates traditional elegance with a contemporary twist. Perfect for half-saree functions or grand celebrations.
description: A masterpiece of Hyderabadi craftsmanship, this Vaddanam combines the timeless beauty of diamonds and pearls with a pop of vibrant emerald green. Its flexible design ensures a comfortable and secure fit. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees lasting brilliance and protection against tarnish. Owning this piece means possessing a treasure with both cultural and heirloom value.
